summary.p: 9 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 38; Qurʾānic Text: Q 33:24-33:40; 7 lines per page; Dimensions: 240/246 x 172mm; Script style: kūfī D.I.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
9 fol. 172×240/246 mm (1.4/1.43). Support: thin transparent parchment of yellowish color. Writing material: black ink.
Collation: one quire, fol. 3 is a singleton with a stub, the rest are bifolia.
I: H1F H2F H3F H4F H5F / F6H F7H F8H S F9H

Text layout: 93×165 mm / 95×165 mm (1.75?/1.8?), 7 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: →D I; letters are stretched horizontally. Diacritics: diagonal dashes (occasional, probably inserted by three different hands. Vocalization: red round dots.

Verse markers: for groups of five verses – golden letter ﻪ (hā); for groups of ten verses – – medallions in the text line (type 2''.C.I) in gold and colors with the inscribed number of verses (ثلثون – fol. 3v).
Inscriptions: numbers of surahs and verses in Roman and Arabic numerals are inscribed in black ink on the upper margins; in the text numbers of verses are inscribed by the same hand.
Stitching: threads are preserved in the punctures of the fold; on the outer fold there are traces of brown substance (leather?).
Defects: stains and traces of moisture; margins damaged, probably by rodents, small holes on fol. 1 and 9; ink peeling off on some pages.
Traces of old conservation: margins of fol. 2–6 are slightly trimmed in the upper left corner; parts of margins cut out in the upper and lower right.

Attached materials: old wrapping (fol. I) consisting of a narrow strip of paper inscribed with letters “C. J.”, brief description of the manuscript in French in brown ink – “8 f. 7 lig.\ S. XXXIII v. 24 à 40” and old accession number in red pencil “B. 16”.
Old accession numbers: C. J. (on the wrapping); B. 16 (on the wrapping and according to Langlois’ inventory).
Fol. 1r–9v. Surah 33, verses 24(24) – 40(40). Incipit: [الصادقين بصد]قهم ويُعذّب . Explicit: خاتم [النبيين] ."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
